instruction: Perform clustering analysis on time-series data to identify similar patterns and group related signals. Implement time-series specific clustering algorithms like Dynamic Time Warping (DTW) k-means, hierarchical clustering, and shape-based clustering methods.
description: Implement clustering algorithms specifically designed for time-series data. Group similar time-series patterns using DTW and other specialized distance metrics.
keywords: clustering, DTW, time-series, pattern recognition, similarity, python, scikit-learn, tslearn, hierarchical clustering
